jp.ramen

Class RAMEN

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.ramen.RAMEN

  • public class RAMEN
extends java.lang.Object
    Main interface. This would be the API of the network. The interface is supposed to use just functions from this module and a couple of getters from the other ones.
    Author:
    Sergio Fuentes de UÃ±a "sergio.fuentesd@estudiante.uam.es", Daniel Perdices Burrero "daniel.perdices@estudiante.uam.es"
